title: The Scariest Part of Halloween This Year Is the Supply Chain
sub_head: Shoppers searching for costumes and decorations for the holiday are finding empty store shelves
body:
Shoppers seeking witches, ghosts and severed heads to decorate their homes for Halloween are finding something truly scary this year: empty shelves.
The supply-chain snarls that have shaped much of life in the pandemic are now responsible for shortages of Halloween d√©cor and costumes. Consumers and suppliers alike are getting creative and planning ahead.
